code: import{getLocalStorage,setLocalStorage,deleteLocalStorage}from"./localStorage";import{getCookie,setCookie,deleteCookie}from"./cookies";export var isAuthenticated=function isAuthenticated(){if(getLocalStorage("user")&&getCookie("token")){return getLocalStorage("user");}else{return false;}};export var setAuthentication=function setAuthentication(token,user){setCookie("token",token);setLocalStorage("user",user);};export var logout=function logout(next){deleteLocalStorage("user");deleteCookie("token");next();};
